about_the_game:
Ravage

immerses you in a post-apocalyptic world infested with zombies, where only the strongest and most cunning can survive. Combine strategy, action, and collaboration in a hostile and challenging environment.

Main Features:
Survival in a Desolate World
Fight against hunger and thirst while facing hordes of zombies and other players. Every decision can mean the difference between life and death in this relentless environment.

Raids:
Form teams and plan raids to loot essential resources. Attack enemy bases, steal supplies, and increase your chances of survival. Cooperation and strategy are key.

Base Building:
Design and build your shelter from scratch. Strengthen your defenses to protect yourself from zombies and other players. Fortify your base to prevent raids and meet your survival needs.

PvP:
Face off against other players in PvP combat. Form alliances or go solo. Betray, defend, and prove your superiority in a world without rules.

Clan System:
Join clans or form your own. Collaborate with other players, share resources and strategies, and fight together for supremacy. Unity is strength in this devastated world.

Looting and Exploration:
Explore a vast open world in search of valuable resources. Find weapons, tools, and supplies to help you survive. Every expedition is an opportunity to improve your skills and equipment.

Immersive Realism:
Immerse yourself in a highly realistic world where the laws of physics and nature govern your survival. Environmental and behavioral realism adds an extra layer of challenge, making every decision count even more.

Do You Have What It Takes?
Survive, fight, build, and collaborate in Revage. Face a world full of challenges and prove you have what it takes to thrive amid chaos. Are you ready to accept the challenge and face the zombie apocalypse?
